types.html:
en tout point

  1. Used other than figuratively or idiomatically: see en,‎ tout,‎ point. at any point; everywhere
    une fonction dérivable en tout point ― a function differentiable everywhere
  2. in every respect, perfectly, totally, entirely
    Synonyms: parfaitement, à tout égard
    en tout point identique ― totally identical
    en tout point conforme ― entirely consistent
trans: Used other than figuratively or idiomatically: see en,‎ tout,‎ point. at any point
in every respect, perfectly, totally, entirely

title: en tout point
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /ɑ̃ tu pwɛ̃/
